org.apache.karaf.config.command

Class ConfigCommandSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.karaf.config.command.ConfigCommandSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CancelCommand, ConfigPropertyCommandSupport, DeleteCommand, EditCommand, ListCommand, MetaCommand, UpdateCommand

    public abstract class ConfigCommandSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    Abstract class from which all commands related to the ConfigurationAdmin service should derive. This command retrieves a reference to the ConfigurationAdmin service before calling another method to actually process the command.
Shall be called with EditCommand, Action, MetaCommand, ConfigPropertyCommandSupport.
